meanings.sent1: I counted to six and then stopped.
meanings.sent2: There are six apples in the basket.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chicken cross the road? To get to the other side of six!
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a burst of six suns.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter echoed through the house six times.

meanings.definition: A group or set of six things.
meanings.sent1: She bought a pack of six pencils for school.
meanings.sent2: The team consisted of six players.
meanings.sent3: The six cupcakes on the table looked too delicious to resist.
meanings.sent4: The six birds flew in perfect formation across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The six books on the shelf formed a colorful display.

meanings.sent1: The family had six members, including the dog.
meanings.sent2: There were six colorful balloons floating in the air.
meanings.sent3: The six kittens played together in the garden, causing mischief.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a puzzle with six missing pieces.
meanings.sent5: The clock struck six, signaling the end of the day.
